org.apache.oodt.pcs.util

Class FileManagerUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.oodt.pcs.util.FileManagerUtils
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PCSConfigMetadata

    public class FileManagerUtils
extends Object
implements PCSConfigMetadata
    A set of utility methods for use by the PCS in communicating with the File Manager.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    mattmann
